revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Pot | class = Pot | game = Strife | doomednum = 165 | convid = 274 }}[[Classes]]: Pot
{{desc}}In Strife1.wad, the sprite is actually named VASEA0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Pot { {{Property|Radius}} 12 {{Property|Height}} 24 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: VAZE A -1 Stop } }
